select count(*) from tbl_user where user_cd = 1
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (prod_key, prod_nm, prod_price, prod_maker, prod_origin, prod_intro, prod_cnt, prod_vol, prod_proof, trading_yn, category_key, upload_date) values (#{prodKey}, #{prodNm}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodMaker}, #{prodOrigin}, #{prodIntro}, #{prodCnt}, #{prodVol}, #{prodProof}, #{tradingYn}, #{categoryKey}, sysdate)
insert into tbl_product_image (img_key, img_nm, img_path, prod_key) values ('im' || to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd') || lpad(seq_product_image.nextval, 4, '0'), #{imgNm}, #{imgPath}, #{prodKey})
mapper.select: select category_key as categoryKey, category_level as categoryLevel, category_nm as categoryNm, higher_category as higherCategory from tbl_product_category where higher_category = #{_currentCategoryKey}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product_category (category_key, category_level, category_nm, higher_category) values ('c' || lpad(seq_product_category.nextval, 4, '0'), #{categoryLevel}, #{categoryNm}, #{higherCategory})
mapper.select: select prod_key as prodKey, prod_nm as prodNm, prod_price as prodPrice, prod_maker as prodMaker, prod_origin as prodOrigin, prod_intro as prodIntro, prod_cnt as prodCnt, upload_date as uploadDate, category_key as categoryKey from tbl_product order by upload_date desc

select category_key as categoryKey, category_level as categoryLevel, category_nm as categoryNm, higher_category as higherCategory from tbl_product_category
select img_key as imgKey, img_nm as imgNm, img_path as imgPath, prod_key as prodKey from tbl_product_image where prod_key = #{prodKey}
